about_the_game:
In Deadly Cosmic you play as Raquel, a scientist who needs to save her co workers from a bizarre accident. But soon she realizes that something more sinister is happening to the facility. What are those creatures? Where did they come from? And the most important question of all: can she survive?

Deadly Cosmic is a short, but fun game inspired by the horror games from the 90s, made in 15 days for the Unexpected jam it earn the 4th place overall and 2nd place on Fun Category. This is a full version of the game, more polished and with many bugs fixed.



Good Luck!

Controls on keyboard:
Spacebar - Skip Cutscene
W - Move forward
S - Move backward
A - Turn left
D - Turn right
Left Mouse Button - Interact/ Open doors/ Pick item
Right Mouse Button - Aim
Left Mouse Button + Right Mouse Button - Shot
shift - Run

The game supports Game Control

content_descriptors.notes: This game is inspired by the classic horror games from 90's, so includes violence with guns and fantastic creatures.
